description:
Kuzan, a former Navy Admiral, stands in the way of Garp who came to rescue Koby. He was once Garp’s pupil but is now a member of the Blackbeard Pirates. What happened to him after he was defeated by Sakazuki is now revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Schock für die Marine! – Ex-Admiral vom Marine-Hauptquartier Kuzan
Kaigun Kyougaku! Moto Kaigun Honbu Taishou Kuzan
La stupéfaction de la Marine. Kuzan, l`ancien amiral !
The Navy Surprised! The Navy Headquarters` Former Admiral, Kuzan
البحريّة في حالة ذهول! الأميرال السّابق في مقّر البحريّة، كوزان!
海軍驚愕! 元海軍本部大将クザン
